professional_summary: Database Administrator with expertise in Oracle databases, experienced in database migrations, recovery strategies, installations, and performance monitoring across multiple organizations.

key_responsibilities: Cloned/Migrated databases using RMAN and traditional Datapump export/import utilities in Oracle 10gR2.
Implemented recovery strategies and successfully recovered databases in case of crashes
Scheduled Physical backups (hot & cold) in CRON tab using RMAN utility and monitored scheduled jobs.
and assigned privileges to users in the relevant groups.
EXPLAIN PLAN utilities for optimizing and tuning SQL queries.
Maintained data integrity and security using integrity constraints and database triggers.
Provided 24X7 support for all production and development databases.
One-off Patch) using 'runInstaller' and perl-based utility 'opatch'.
Implemented Oracle's Transportable Tablespace (TTS) feature using Datapump Export/Import for quick user tablespace movement between databases.
